name: sAIS
description: Server-AIS self-reporting service for Garmin DeLorme devices

MAPSHARE_ID.description: The MapShare ID, found at explore.delorme.com in the 'Social' section.

REPORT_MMSI.description: The MMSI number of the vessel to be used in the self-report.

REPORT_SENDER.description:
The e-mail address of the individual who is SENDING the self-reports.
Use a real address or MarineTraffic might mark your self-reports as spam.
